name: Staying Put
description:
Subramaniam found you shortly after all hell broke loose with the Grémillets. He found you this place and told you to lay low for now. Explore. Poke around.

An entry in LocusJam 2015.

IFDB page | Play online here

This game uses the typical commands in interactive fiction. Enter commands in the imperative (as if you were telling someone to do something) and press enter. Key verbs are EXAMINE (X), TAKE, INVENTORY (I), and cardinal compass directions (N, E, S, W). Please direct all feedback to verity.virtue [AT] gmail [DOT] com!
